name: Fairy Tree House Game - Let's makeover the room!!
name_original: Fairy Tree House Game - Let's makeover the room!!
description:
Welcome to Fairy Tree House - a cool kid game!

Do you think you have the skills with Fairy Tree House - a cool kid game?

The flower fairies just built a new tree house. They need your help decorate the interior rooms. There are living room, kitchen, bathroom and bedroom. Use different furnitures and decorations to make the rooms functional and comfortable. Oh these fairy items are so cute and dreamy! Do you wish to live in a tree house like this? Play this fun fairy tree house decoration game and enjoy your interior design work! Have fun!

Let's get started!

Game features:

• Simple and easy to use!
• Great Graphics!
• Kids will love it and be entertained for ages!
• Cute and friendly design !
• Awesome Sounds and music!
• Beautiful graphics and characters!
• Catchy sounds and music!
• Easy game-play even for the smallest kids!
